tool_description: send otp verification code to any number and verify otp code
name: Otp sms verification
title: Otp sms verification

api_list.name: verify code
api_list.description: verify code that has been sent using send code api
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://otp-sms-verification.p.rapidapi.com/verify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "otp-sms-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: send sms
api_list.description: send otp verification code to number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://otp-sms-verification.p.rapidapi.com/sendOtp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
